title: sarva jIva dayApari shankara (third AvaraNam)
sahitya:
sarva jIva dayApari shankara hrdayEshvari sadAnanda shiva bIja mantrEshvari sarvadA sadA tvAmEvanamAmi


anupallavi

  sarva samkSObhaNASTa daLa padma cakrEshvari gupta tara yOgini ananga kusumAdhyaSTa 
dEvI samUha mOhini para mantra tantrEshvari vyApaka bhaNDAsura mada bhanjani


caraNam    AnandA karSita sthUla sUkSmamaya bAhyAntara prapanca pAlini jnAnamaya svaprakAsha 
rUpiNi kAma kalA pradarshinidIna jana rakSiNi sarvAkarSiNi aNimAdi siddhi natapradAyini
			(madhyamakAlam)
nAnAvidha yantra rUpiNi nAma rUpa mantra vimarshini
gAna rUpa tantrI samanvita vINA dhAriNi nArAyaNi
